title: Large Language Models in Information Retrieval
description: Using LLMs in a modular end-to-end Information Retrieval pipeline (rewrite, retrieve, rerank, evaluate) to improve retrieval performance (Normalized Discounted Cumulative Gain, Mean Reciprocal Rank, Recall, Precision).

title: Dastgyr.com
description: A large-scale B2B e-commerce platform built with NestJS, React.js, PostgreSQL. Built new features from scratch that impacted thousands of users. Migrated core services to a modern microservice architecture, introduced a reward and incentive system that boosted engagement, and improved how sellers and buyers interact with the platform.

title: Kisaan
description: Agritech platform with financial inclusion to help rural communities. As a Senior Software Engineer, I worked on architectural design, building scalable backend services and modernizing core systems that power features like new user onboarding and order processing. Introduced observability, monitoring, integrating OpenTelemetry and Sentry to collect metrics, track application health.

title: GrocerApp
description: A local e-commerce platform bult with Node.js, React, PostgreSQL. Revamped the platformâ€™s customer support experience by integrating Zendesk, reducing live chat resolution time by 80%. Built features that enhanced customer engagement and retention, including personalized order recommendations and gamification-driven loyalty elements.
